original_title: LOVEHOTELに於ける情事とPLANの涯て
overview: A black comedy about a man who works out a plan to change his life. In a locked room in a love hotel, an unexpected turn occurs as the thoughts and positions of the characters intersect, each holding the other's weakness while also being held by the other.
title: LOVEHOTEL ni Okeru Jouji to PLAN no Hate
